item.title: [9ed] Coercion
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

item.title: [7ed] Coat of Arms
item.description:
Artifact

Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

item.title: [8ed] Coat of Arms
item.description:
Artifact

Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

item.title: [9ed] Coat of Arms

Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

item.title: [8ed] Coastal Tower
item.description:

Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [8ed] Coastal Piracy
item.description:
Enchantment

item.title: [8ed] Coastal Hornclaw
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.

item.title: [9ed] Clone
item.description:

item.title: [8ed] Call of the Wild
item.description:
Enchantment

{2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

item.description:

item.title: [8ed] Bribery
item.description:
Sorcery

Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

item.title: [7ed] Breath of Life
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [8ed] Brass Herald
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

item.title: [9ed] Bottle Gnomes
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Gnome

Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

item.title: [9ed] Booby Trap
item.description:
Artifact

As Booby Trap enters the battlefield, choose an opponent and a card name other than a basic land card name.

The chosen player reveals each card they draw.

When the chosen player draws a card with the chosen name, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.

item.title: [9ed] Boiling Seas
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all Islands.

item.title: [7ed] Boil
